name: Cas13 Variant Selection
description: Selects the most efficient Cas13 variant for RNA targeting based on organism-specific optimizations, including efficiency and specificity.

inputs.name: organism_name
inputs.description: The name of the organism for which the optimal Cas13 variant is being selected.

outputs.description: A dictionary containing details of the selected Cas13 variant, including variant name, efficiency, and specificity.
